title: Banjiui Bimil-ilgi
synopsis: The lively and cheerful growth diary of Pan Ji and his friends is a super optimistic girl Pan Ji who can forget even if her mother is angry, even if her grades are not satisfactory. Although the academic performance is not ideal, as long as you can play with your close friends Kinxin and Xiangxiang, you can be very happy Pan Ji. With relatives, friends, and loving family members, Pan Ji's every day is super HAPPY. It is said that the dream is to become a cartoonist, but according to different moods every day, Pan Ji's dream will change rapidly. The cute and lively story of Pan Ji and his friends will unfold slowly in the beautiful and sweet strawberry town. What will they do to entertain us today? This is the secret (translated from iqiyi)
